name: Ball Buster Td
description:
A funny web tower-defence game with lots of balls.

The game is pretty convoluted for a plain javascript game.It got a level editor,a bunch of maps,unlocks, endless mode,lots of differnt towers,fancy settings and cool funny sounds.
It might be a bit unoptimised , as it will run pretty slow (to be fair,there is a bunch of collision detection going on).But if you can sit that aside it can be pretty entertaining.

Loading in Maps is pretty easy, you just need to click "Add Map" and click "Next Map" until the imported map is selected.
